channel.title: Testings on DMN developer documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Testings on DMN developer documentation

item.description: Testing In order to test the integration of the api, ticket widget or booking widget, you can use the DesignMyNight Quality Assurance (QA) environment. Note: you will not receive an email as only whitelisted email address will be sent on the DesignMyNight Test Environments. If you wish to be added to the whitelist please let us know. Public test APIâ€™s is available at the following locations - https://api-qa.designmynight.com/v4/venues - https://api-qa.designmynight.com/v4/bookings
